text: B4U Movies is a Bollywood movie digital TV channel based in Mumbai available on more than 8 different satellites, in more than 100 countries including the US, UK, Europe, Middle East, Africa, Mauritius, Canada, and India. The channel broadcasts a mixture of classic and contemporary Bollywood films. There are 4 different versions of the channel available in the UK, North America, the Middle East and South Asia. Each version of the channel produces a quantity of local programming which reflects the culture and tastes of the local population of the Indian Diaspora. One such program (only shown on the South Asian version of B4U movies) is a talent contest for young actors, directors and screenwriters aged 7â€“15. The show concluded with the 4 finalists of the contest having their debut films premiered on the channel. ==Related pages== * ATN B4U Movies ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * B4U movies live streaming FTA Category:Television channels in India Category:1999 establishments in Asia
title: B4U Movies
